metadata.title: CVE-2024-24861 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: A race condition was found in the Linux kernel's media/xc4000 device driverin xc4000 xc4000_get_frequency() function. This can result in return valueoverflow issue, possibly leading to malfunction or denial of service issue.
